text: right Halifax Parish was created as a civil parish in Prince County, Prince Edward Island, Canada, during the 1764-1766 survey of Samuel Holland. It contains the following townships: * Lot 8 * Lot 9 * Lot 10 * Lot 11 * Lot 12 Category:Parishes of Prince Edward Island Category:Geography of Prince County, Prince Edward Island
title: Halifax Parish, Prince Edward Island
